definitions: a dish consisting of a round patty of ground beef, or sometimes another savory ingredient, that is fried or grilled and typically served in a split bun or roll with various condiments and toppings

examples.text: Tilly had a burger and fries
he sometimes schedules business lunches at his favorite burger joint in Manhattan

shortDefinitions: dish consisting of cake of minced beef served in bread roll

definitions: a round patty of a savory ingredient, typically ground beef

examples.text: I grilled the burgers for 5 minutes per side
homemade black bean burgers and turkey burgers

shortDefinitions: flat round cake made of savory ingredient
